a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths in state-based conflicts by world region
Direct deaths of both military personnel and civilians. Deaths from disease or famine are not included. The region does
not always relate to where the fighting occurred â€“ it sometimes refers to the region of the participants in the conflict.
Data source: OWID based on PRIO and UCDP
Note: 'State-based' conflicts are between states, or a state and a non-state armed organised group. The 'best' estimates from the sources are
used, or - if unavailable - the mid-point between high and low estimates.
